hero.title: About Me
hero.subtitle: Front-end Developer | AgriTech Pioneer
hero.summary: I am Abdulrahman Nashaat, a React/Next.js developer and an Agricultural Science student. My mission is to build the bridge between two worlds, developing impactful AgriTech solutions, with Allah's help, that serve the farmer and contribute to a sustainable future, by Allah's will.

story.p1: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. My compass has always been a profound belief: that we are 'stewards upon the Earth,' entrusted with its cultivation. This is not just a belief, but a call to action, and by Allah's grace, it led me to a passion at a unique intersection: the world of 'The Land' and the world of 'Logic & Programming.'
story.p2: My first path was 'The Land.' As a student at the Faculty of Agricultural Science, I witnessed the challenge firsthand. I saw a vast gap between the ancient wisdom of the field and the immense potential of technology. I saw data being lost and decisions made on intuition alone. I realized 'passion' for agriculture needed 'tools' to truly flourish.
story.p3: Here, by Allah's guidance, I began the second path: 'Programming.' This was not a career change; it was 'equipping for the mission.' At the Information Technology Institute (ITI), I honed my skills as a Front-End Developer. I didn't just learn React and Next.js as technologies; I learned them as tools to build 'bridges' and solve problems.
story.p4: My mission, by Allah's will, is to *be* that 'Bridge.' I am not just a developer who writes code, nor just an agricultural student who analyzes soil. I am an 'AgriTech' developer who comes from the heart of the field. My goal is clear: to transform complex data into 'impactful tools' and clear insights that serve the farmer and the engineer.
story.p5: I believe this work is 'cooperation in righteousness and piety.' I ask Allah to open the doors of goodness for me, and to bless me with a righteous work environment where I can contribute beneficial knowledge, and be part of a more sustainable and prosperous agricultural future, by Allah's will.

step1.title: Laying the Foundation (Programming)
step1.description: During the first-year college break, I began my journey learning Front-End development and web fundamentals.

step2.title: Refining Skills through Practice
step2.description: Moving from 'learning' to 'application' by building personal and experimental projects, developing practical experience.

step3.title: Defining the Academic Path
step3.description: Starting specialized academic studies in Agricultural Sciences, which opened the door to link technology with agricultural sciences.

step4.title: Intensive Training (ITI)
step4.description: Completed the 'Web Development using React' program (120 hrs) at the Information Technology Institute (ITI) to refine my skills.

step5.title: Towards Professionalism (Next.js & Redux)
step5.description: Completed 'The Ultimate React Course' to learn Next.js, Redux, and advanced development skills.

step6.title: The Current Mission: AgriTech
step6.description: Dedicating acquired skills (programming + agriculture) to develop innovative solutions, striving to achieve the vision mentioned in the summary.

cert1.title: Web Development using React Js (120 hrs)

coreCompetencies.description: A detailed breakdown of my technical skills as a Front-End Developer specializing in building interactive web applications.

additionalExpertise.title: Additional Expertise
additionalExpertise.description: Bridging the gap between technology and traditional agriculture, complemented by essential interpersonal abilities.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy & Mission
philosophy.quote: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Believing in the responsibility of stewardship (Istikhlaf) on Earth, I unite the 'craft' of technology and the 'science' of agriculture, striving to make every line of code a blessed seed in the field of the future, seeking the pleasure of Allah and the aid of His creation.

about.title: About Me
about.description: React developer specializing in AgriTech, I aim to merge technology with agriculture to create sustainable and innovative solutions.
